title: Dataset Distillation

definitions.Dataset Distillation: Dataset distillation has emerged as a powerful approach for reducing data requirements in deep learning. i.e., condensing a large, real dataset into a smaller, synthetic one

summary: The slide discusses Dataset Distillation, a method in deep learning that reduces data requirements by condensing a large, real dataset into a smaller, synthetic one. It includes a diagram showing the process of dataset distillation, where a large dataset is reduced to a smaller synthetic dataset, and both datasets are used to train a neural network, resulting in similar test performance.
